message:
I also noticed Jan's issue above, and their fix worked, but I had another issue:
Rather than be stuck to the player, the camera continues to "follow" them, as though it had smoothing enabled, leaving it trailing behind them.

Also, when you load a scene, if your character isn't centered on the node, it will noticeably "drag" your camera over to them.

Is there a way to take this script and edit it so that neither of these are the case anymore?
